law.catch_line: Fetal homicide in the fourth degree.

text.section: A person is guilty of fetal homicide in the fourth degree when, with recklessness, he causes the death of an unborn child.
Fetal homicide in the fourth degree is a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 5, effective February 20, 2004.
